results.title: Angry Boy
results.creator_credit: Irving Jacoby, Aram Boyajian, Alexander Hammid and Affiliated Film Producers
results.brief_description: An analysis of the emotional disturbance of a boy whose hostility finds expression in terms of stealing. Through the help of a child guidance clinic, this hostility is traced back to the source in the home life of the child where a good and well-intentioned mother has been taking out her hostility toward her mother and her husband in an over-protective attitude toward the child. The film then develops as it describes the process in which the child is helped by guidance personnel in his way to recovery. Cinematography by Peter Glushanok.

results.title: Drink no Longer Water
results.creator_credit: Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation and Fontana Films
results.brief_description: A humourous romp through various wine styles set in the country in a castle-like structure. Vignettes played out by actors - some in period costume to emulate the character of various wine varieties/styles from Moselle “for first lovers” through to claret are you old enough? Featuring Australian actors Steve Bisley and Mel Gibson in their youth.

results.title: For Tomorrow
results.creator_credit: Norman Castle, Lilias Fraser, Conzinc Riotinto of Australia and Fraser Castle Productions
results.brief_description: Conzinc Riotinto sends geologists to Bougainville to search for minerals. The rugged mountainous jungle country, heat and humidity makes it an arduous task. They establish a drilling site where much sampling, testing and drilling of the area is carried out to evaluate the location.

results.title: Nimmo St
results.brief_description: This film is a short drama with a musical soundtrack and no dialogue set around Nimmo Street in Middle Park, Melbourne. A young man meets a woman arriving on a ‘Red Rattler’ train and walks her home. On the way, they are accosted by two thugs but manage to avoid conflict. When the young woman reaches her home and doesn’t invite the man in, he leaves and takes out his frustration on the thugs when he encounters them again in the street. A simple, beautifully shot, low budget film capturing Melbourne’s inner suburban street life.

results.title: [Black Knight]
results.brief_description: A survey of the development of the British “Black Knight” rocket test vehicle and its use in high speed flight and ballistic missile research. The elements of construction, ground support equipment, propulsion, guidance and instrumentation are discussed. Tests and launching preparations at Australia’s Woomera Range follow, closing with a night-firing sequence. NB: No opening or closing credits

results.title: Train control
results.brief_description: Shows how the movements of trains on the New South Wales railway system are controlled to ensure smooth running and prevent accidents. When the system has been explained, its working is illustrated by tracing the journey of a goods train from one point to another.
